short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ezlistr - real-time sync'd social lists powered by and stored in the cloud. extension for the ezlistr web app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ezlistr [alpha]
- real-time sync'd social lists powered by and stored in the cloud.
- keep track of groceries, items, info, errands, etc.
- edit lists on the go with cloud-sync.
- pick up from where you left off on any device.
- any list owner can add/remove users from their list.
- create or join a list with others.
- invite friends to a list.
- extension for the ezlistr web app (https://ezlistr.web.app/).









[alpha build]
- *testing real-time functionality & sync. data subject to deletion until out of alpha/beta phase.*

- The default options one can choose to sign up through the extension are the following:
  - anonymously
  - email/password combo.

- Currently, the new chrome manifest (v3), is more secure and does not allow for Google auth, so the extension does not offer it. Google auth is only available through the web app https://ezlistr.web.app/.
